channel.title: Want to add a milking cow function
channel.description: I am using a pi source, and I was wondering how I would go about adding the function of milking a cow at the lumby cow farm... I was unable to find any tutorials so :/

item.title: Want to add a milking cow function
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Obviously you didn’t look hard.

http://www.runeserver.com/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/359865-pi-adding-cow-milking.html

item.title: Want to add a milking cow function
item.dc:creator: @Pwnerofppl Pwnerofppl
item.description:
@Pwnerofppl wrote:

hgaits:

I am using a pi source, and I was wondering how I would go about adding the function of milking a cow at the lumby cow farm… I was unable to find any tutorials so

Maybe in all the cases make case (CowID) then make it require a bucket, make it delete the bucket and add a bucket of milk
(that’s easy on Allstar) then find the animation for milking a cow, make it do that animation and send a message if you want.
Although I only really Code Allstar so I don’t know. Hope I helped if not, sorry

Read full topic
